content.raw:
I just added a new test to capture these failures in b825fee0002d. We had a test for urdf with fixed joints and visuals, but the parent link of the fixed joint had a visual. The seg-faults seem to occur when the parent link is empty. So, I added a [test/integration/fixed_joint_reduction_visual.urdf](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/b825fee0002d0167b0d8e55c65a964ab5e0e099b/test/integration/fixed_joint_reduction_visual.urdf), which is a slight variant of [test/integration/fixed_joint_reduction.urdf](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/b825fee0002d0167b0d8e55c65a964ab5e0e099b/test/integration/fixed_joint_reduction.urdf) without the parent link visuals.

This test currently fails for me on trusty with the following packages:
~~~
ii  liburdfdom-model0.2:amd64                             0.2.10+dfsg-1                                       amd64        URDF DOM - model library
ii  liburdfdom-headers-dev                                0.2.3+dfsg-1                                        all          URDF DOM - header files
~~~
